data.name: Notch Original Soundtrack - Alpha Episode
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack for Notch The Innocent LunA: Eclipsed SinnerS - Alpha Episode, created by talented composers such as Yoake Nemu, Unnamed(+Silent Rebirth+) and Invoke. Enjoy the rhythmic and wonderful tracks.

You can find all downloaded tracks in this directory: steamapps\common\The Innocent Luna Eclipsed SinnerS\Notch Original Soundtrack - Alpha Episode\

Trackllist:

  • 01. Main Theme 01:32
  • 02. Eternity 01:43
  • 03. Deep Red 01:39
  • 04. Moonlight 01:23
  • 05. Flower Rain 03:45
  • 06. The Garden - Chapter 1 01:24
  • 07. The Garden - Chapter 2 01:08
  • 08. The Garden - Chapter 3 01:31
  • 09. Grey Memories 00:55
  • 10. Horror 01:22
  • 11. Daylight - Chapter 1 02:38
  • 12. Daylight - Chapter 2 00:33
  • 13. Loli 01:15
  • 14. Double Helix 02:18
  • 15. Freedom 01:30
  • 16. Night - Chapter 1 01:19
  • 17. Night - Chapter 2 01:25
  • 18. Enjoyment 02:48
  • 19. Palingenesis(Vocal Ver.) 03:30
  • 20. Palingenesis 02:49
  • 21. Oath(2nd Ver.) 04:00
  • 22. Sunlight 01:54
  • 23. Fireflies 01:42
  • 24. Fireflies II 01:31
  • 25. Unknown 03:56
  • 26. Final Redemption 02:05
  • 27. Fragments of the World 00:34
